May 19, 2002 D Weston-super-Mare (Second Section)
Weston-super-Mare (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Weston-super-Mare Contest weston-super-mare-second-section
Winter Gardens, Weston-super-Mare, Somerset, England, UK Fred Trego Memorial Trophy (Best Euphonium): Lympstone Prizes - 1st £130, 2nd £100, 3rd £60. 4 bands competed.
Feb. 19, 2012, 1:57 p.m. July 7, 2020, 1:03 p.m.
1 Chalford Band Steve Tubb Diversions - Variations on a Swiss Folk Song
2 South West Comms Band Charles Fleming Resurgam
3 Cwmbran Band John Burns A Salford Sinfonietta
4 Stourport-on-Severn Brass Band Unknown Symphony for Brass [arr. Hopkinson]
Withdrawn Croft Silver Band Steve Burton
Withdrawn Snibston - Desford Kevin Steward
Withdrawn St. Pinnock Band Mark Medlyn
